product_name: Salomon XR Mission Trail-Running Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The kids' Salomon XR Mission Trail-Running Shoes are terrain-tackling running shoes built just for children's little feet. Breathable and abrasion-resistant nylon mesh uppers feature asymmetric synthetic leather overlays that wrap and secure insteps for a precise fit. Quicklace(TM) lacing system with friction-free eyelets takes just a single pull for a perfect fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. Protective toe caps guard against bumps and abrasion. Foam insoles enhance comfort. Polyester linings quickly wick moisture away from feet for enhanced comfort. EVA midsoles cushion trail impacts. Contagrip rubber outsoles provide solid traction and tenacious grip. Closeout.
short_description: The kids' Salomon XR Mission Trail-Running Shoes are terrain-tackling running shoes built just for children's little feet.
